TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

summary.span: 提供 控制項的 事件資料。

span.span: Provides data for the event of the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 類別用於方法，以提供存取權的商務物件執行個體所使用的任何資料作業之後控制項和商務物件會執行，但企業之前終結物件。The class is used in the method to provide access to the business object instance after any data operations that are using the control and business object are performed, but before the business object is destroyed. 使用存取商務物件屬性。The business object is accessed using the property. 藉由新增委派以處理事件，您可以存取商務物件的最後一個工作，或清除任何公開的成員。By adding a delegate to handle the event, you can access any publicly exposed members of the business object to perform any final work or clean up. 方法不由呼叫控制項，如果執行資料作業的方法是`static`方法。The method is not called by the control, if the method that performs data operations is a `static` method. 靜態方法時，會不建立任何商務物件執行個體。No business object instance is created when the method is static. 控制項會公開許多您可以使用基礎的商務物件在其生命週期中的不同時間處理的事件。The control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its lifecycle. 下表列出的事件，以及相關聯類別和事件處理常式委派。The following table lists the events and the associated classes and event handler delegates. |Event - 事件Event|EventArgsEventArgs|事件處理常式EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |。.

只有在建立商務物件的執行個體之前立即發生。Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.||| |。.

建立商務物件的執行個體之後立即發生。Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.||| |。.

在擷取資料之前發生。Occurs before the data is retrieved.||| |、 和 。, , and .

執行插入、 更新或刪除作業之前發生。Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.||| |

在擷取資料之後，就會發生。Occurs after the data is retrieved.||| |、 和 。, , and .

插入、 更新或刪除作業完成之後，就會發生。Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.||| |。.

在商務物件被終結之前發生。Occurs before a business object is destroyed.||| ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項使用商務物件和控制項來顯示資訊。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to display information. 第二個程式碼範例提供第一個程式碼範例使用的範例中介層商務物件。The second code example provides the example middle-tier business object that the first code example uses. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項使用商務物件和控制項來顯示資訊。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to display information. 您也可以是非常耗費資源 （依據時間或資源） 建立的 Web 網頁執行每個資料作業的商務物件。You might work with a business object that is very expensive (in terms of time or resources) to create for every data operation that your Web page performs. 高度耗費資源的物件所使用的一種方法可能會建立它的執行個體一次，然後加以和快取的後續作業，而不是建立和終結針對每個資料作業。One way to work with an expensive object might be to create an instance of it once, and then cache it for subsequent operations instead of creating and destroying it for every data operation. 此範例會示範這個模式。This example demonstrates this pattern. 您可以處理首先，檢查物件的快取，然後再建立執行個體，，只有當其中一個不已快取的事件。You can handle the event to check the cache for an object first, and then create an instance, only if one is not already cached. 然後，處理快取供未來使用，而不是終結該商務物件的事件。Then, handle the event to cache the business object for future use, instead of destroying it. 在此範例中，的屬性物件設定為`true`，以直接不呼叫執行個體上的方法。In this example, the property of the object is set to `true`, to direct the to not call the method on the instance. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/objds16cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/objds16vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例提供上述的程式碼範例使用的範例中介層商務物件。The following code example provides an example middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 在程式碼範例包含基本的商務物件，定義由`EmployeeLogic`類別，這是會維護狀態，並封裝商務邏輯的類別。The code example consists of a basic business object, defined by the `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a class that maintains state and encapsulates business logic. 如需完整的實用範例，您必須編譯為程式庫，此程式碼，然後使用 從 ASP 頁面這些類別。For a complete working example, you must compile this code as a library, and then use these classes from an ASP page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/northwindemployee16.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/northwindemployee16.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得物件，表示 控制項用於執行資料作業的商務物件。

span.span: Gets an object that represents the business object with which the control performs data operations.

value.span: 用來進行資料作業的商務物件；如果 傳遞至 ，則為 。

span.span: The business object the uses to data operations; otherwise, , if is passed to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果資料作業方法 (， ， ，和) 是執行個體方法，執行個體的商務物件方法執行之前建立。If the data operation methods (, , , and ) are instance methods, an instance of the business object is created before the method is executed. 您可以防止儲存中的物件建立的每個呼叫的商務物件屬性中的事件處理常式。You can prevent the business object from being created for each call by saving the object in the property in the event handler. 在後續事件，您可以擷取商務物件，從屬性。In subsequent events, you can retrieve the business object from the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項使用商務物件和控制項來顯示資訊。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to display information. 您也可以是非常耗費資源 （依據時間或資源） 建立的 Web 網頁執行每個資料作業的商務物件。You might work with a business object that is very expensive (in terms of time or resources) to create for every data operation that your Web page performs. 高度耗費資源的物件所使用的一種方法可能會建立它的執行個體一次，然後加以和快取的後續作業，而不是建立和終結針對每個資料作業。One way to work with an expensive object might be to create an instance of it once, and then cache it for subsequent operations instead of creating and destroying it for every data operation. 此範例會示範這個模式。This example demonstrates this pattern. 您可以處理首先，檢查物件的快取，然後再建立執行個體，，只有當其中一個不已快取的事件。You can handle the event to check the cache for an object first, and then create an instance, only if one is not already cached. 然後，處理快取供未來使用，而不是終結該商務物件的事件。Then, handle the event to cache the business object for future use, instead of destroying it. 在此範例中，的屬性類別會設定為`true`，以直接不呼叫執行個體上。In this example, the property of the class is set to `true`, to direct the to not call on the instance. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/objds16cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/objds16vb.aspx#1)]
